mapper.update: UPDATE study s SET s.status = !s.status WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sd.id, sd.cover_plan_url, sd.title, sd.study_type, sd.`status`, sd.classify, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM study_user WHERE type = 1 AND study_id = sd.id) AS praise FROM study sd ) temp
WHERE 1 = 1 AND `status` = 1
AND study_type = 99
AND study_type = #{study_type} AND classify = 1
AND grade = #{grade}
AND subject = #{subject}
order by praise DESC

SELECT st.id, st.title, st.`status`, st.create_at, au.author_name, st.introduce, st.video_url, st.video_time, st.cover_plan_url, st.content, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM study_user WHERE type = 1 AND study_id = st.id) AS praise, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM study_user WHERE type = 2 AND study_id = st.id) AS collect, IF (spraise_s.id != 0, 1, 0) AS praise_status, IF (scollect_s.id != 0, 1, 0) AS collect_status FROM study st LEFT OUTER JOIN author au ON au.id = st.author LEFT OUTER JOIN study_user spraise_s ON spraise_s.type = 1 AND spraise_s.study_id = #{studyId} AND spraise_s.user_id = #{userId} LEFT OUTER JOIN study_user scollect_s ON scollect_s.type = 2 AND scollect_s.user_id = #{userId} AND scollect_s.study_id = #{studyId} WHERE st.id = #{studyId} AND st.`status` = 1 AND st.study_type = #{studyType} GROUP BY st.id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM study_user WHERE study_id = #{studyId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND type = #{type}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sd.id, sd.cover_plan_url, sd.title, sd.study_type, sd.`status`, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM study_user WHERE type = 1 AND study_id = sd.id) AS praise FROM study sd ) temp WHERE 1 = 1 AND `status` = 1 AND study_type = 1 ORDER BY praise DESC LIMIT #{num}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.id, s.classify, s.content, s.cover_plan_url, s.create_at, s.create_by, s.grade, s.introduce, s.status, s.study_type, s.subject, s.title, s.update_at, s.update_by, s.video_time, s.video_url, s.author, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM study_user WHERE type = 1 AND study_id = s.id) AS praise, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM study_user WHERE type = 2 AND study_id = s.id) AS collect, au.author_name, au.author_img FROM study s INNER JOIN author au ON s.author = au.id ) temp WHERE study_type = 1 AND `status` = 1 order by update_at DESC

SELECT temp.*,study_user.user_id,study_user.study_id,study_user.type,study_user.create_at AS create_time FROM (SELECT st.id, st.title, st.create_at, st.introduce, au.author_name, st.cover_plan_url, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM study_user WHERE type = 1 AND study_id = st.id) AS praise, (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM study_user WHERE type = 2 AND study_id = st.id) AS collect, IF (spraise_s.id != 0, 1, 0) AS praise_status, IF (scollect_s.id != 0, 1, 0) AS collect_status FROM study st LEFT OUTER JOIN author au ON au.id = st.author LEFT OUTER JOIN study_user spraise_s ON spraise_s.type = 1 AND spraise_s.study_id = st.id AND spraise_s.user_id = #{id} LEFT OUTER JOIN study_user scollect_s ON scollect_s.type = 2 AND scollect_s.user_id = #{id} AND scollect_s.study_id = st.id WHERE st.`status` = 1 AND st.study_type = 1 GROUP BY st.id) temp,study_user WHERE temp.id = study_user.study_id AND study_user.user_id = #{id} AND study_user.type = 2 ORDER BY temp.create_at DESC
